hadiths.text: It was narrated from Tawus that Ibn`Abbas told that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) merely said:“For one of you to give (land) to his brother is better for him than if he were to take a set amount in rent for it.”

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُظَاهِرُ يُجَامِعُ قَبْلَ أَنْ يُكَفِّرَ
chapter.eng-name: A man who declared Zihar upon his wife, having intercourse with her before offering expiation
